a1: Thumbnails are available in HD (1280x720), SD (640x480), HQ (480x360), and MQ (320x180). Not all resolutions may be available for every video.
q2: Do I need to be logged in to YouTube?
a2: No. Thumbnails are publicly accessible for all YouTube videos. Simply paste the video URL and download the resolution you need.
q3: What YouTube URL formats are supported?
a3: The tool supports standard youtube.com/watch URLs, youtu.be short links, YouTube Shorts URLs, and embed URLs. You can also paste just the video ID.
